Commonly known as Pang, Sete TrÃªs or 73, but I prefer <div> Dementor. An AnimationWithEase() Evangelist. A Savage Entreprenot.

Graduated in Advertising, with over 10 years experience in digital marketing, web design, and development. During this time I had the privilege to work with brands such as Petrobras, Fiat, Citi, Vale, Hyundai, LG, Tim, and Vivo.

With self-taught development background and a desire to create new experiences and interactions, the only way possible for me after hundreds of thousands of lines was to focus on Digital Product Design. I just love the whole process of buildings things from scratch. Everything coming to life, from the problem to delivery and the post analysis of the results.

A friend once told me that Brazilians have a weird father-son relationship with projects they work on. "Finally my baby is born". Can anyone relate to this? I just needed to point that out. Shout out to all the parents!

If you want to know more about me, the name of my dogs, what kind of seasoning I use on my beans or just to say hi, you can drop me a line.
